heisigStory: In this kanji we are shown someone spending an entire day at mending one stocking, because they want the job done "just so." Be sure to make a clear image of a finicky old fusspot to make the abstract idea as concrete as possible.
koohiiStory1: ´Sun´ ´Mend´ - It just so happens that sunshine can mend your gloomy spirits.
koohiiStory2: My image here is of Fabrice (the guy who runs this website) spending all day obsessively mending the code so this page looks just so....
myStory: chỉ vậy. mặt trời chỉ lướt qua đầu
words:
是正(ぜせい): correction, revision
是非とも(ぜひとも): by all means (with sense of not taking "no" for an answer)
是非(ぜひ): certainly, without fail
